title: New: Kent Odessa – Radar Gaze
body:
Brooklyn’s **Kent Odessa** has such an addictive vibe to his unique odd-pop stylings.

Latest single _Radar Gaze_, arguably his most outwardly accessible release yet, scurries along with a delightful shuffle to it, feeling somewhere between Vampire Weekend and Tame Impala. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
